io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.spi

Interface ExceptionStatusAndLoggingStrategy


  • @ConsumerType
public interface ExceptionStatusAndLoggingStrategy
    Allows users of this framework to specify how VndErrorResponseRenderer handles specific exceptions that the framework doesn't know about

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Integer extractStatusCode(Throwable error) 
      default String getErrorMessageWithoutRedundantInformation(Throwable error) 
      default boolean logAsCompactWarning(Throwable error) 

    • Method Detail

      • extractStatusCode

        default Integer extractStatusCode(Throwable error)
        Parameters:
        error - an exception that was thrown when rendering a resource
        Returns:
        the status code that should be used for the response

      • logAsCompactWarning

        default boolean logAsCompactWarning(Throwable error)
        Parameters:
        error - an exception that was thrown when rendering a resource
        Returns:
        true if this exception should not be logged as an error with full stack trace

      • getErrorMessageWithoutRedundantInformation

        default String getErrorMessageWithoutRedundantInformation(Throwable error)
        Parameters:
        error - an exception that was thrown when rendering a resource
        Returns:
        the message to be displayed in the VND+error resource (and in logging)
